description: Redevelopment behind retained facades at 372-380 Grays Inn Road and 285 to 297 Pentonville Road and demolition of buildings at 283 Pentonville Road and 368-370 Grays Inn Road and construction of new replacement building to provide new office (B1) accommodation at first, second and third floor levels and use of the larger ground floor unit for either retail (A1) or food and drink (A3) and the smaller unit facing Pentonville Road and the kiosk facing Grays Inn Road for retail (A1) purposes plus a two bedroom residential unit facing Pentonville Road.
decision_conditions:
The Council welcome the treatment of the facade to Pentonville Road and Grays Inn Road, but urges the retention of all chimneys.

The Council considered that the centre of the new eastern facade should be treated in a simpler and more modern fashion.

The Council considered that an internal refurbishment for small offices would be preferable.
